title: My month testing Revolut and Curve metal cards - and what you should know before getting one
text:
There’s a curious effect that comes from paying for something with a metal bank card.

After just a month of using them, I found myself lingering at the self service machines in supermarkets and placing my card down on the restaurant table a little too enthusiastically at the end of meals.

Quite simply, having a metal card in your wallet makes you want to show off. Perhaps that's why, to the bemusement of many, they have become the nation's latest obsessions.

With their heavy weight and metallic surface, the cards seem to suggest that their bearer is part of the financial A-list - a big spender who has been awarded with a metal card due to their heavy spending.
